New Records: Glenn Maxwell equalled the record for the most T20 international centuries with his fifth hundred
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored a blistering unbeaten 120 off 55 balls
West Indies finished on 207-9 in response
Australia clinched the series 2-0 with one match to play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia posted their highest Twenty20 total on home soil with 241-4
Marcus Stoinis finished the pick of the home side’s attack with 3-36
Rovman Powell plundered 63 off 36 balls and Andre Russell hit 37 from 16
Others: There was also a bizarre incident in the third ball of the penultimate over of the game when last man Alzarri Joseph appeared to be run out by a throw from Tim David to the non-striker’s end
